amendment.description: To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Marine Corps Reserve, $1,500,000 for the Individual First Aid Kit.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4362 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4362 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Marine Corps Reserve, $1,500,000 for the Individual First Aid Kit.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4362 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4362 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Landrieu.
